    User Page: M.Ufuk TATLIDIL (tr-TR) - TechNet Articles - United States (English) - TechNet Wiki

    Hi, I’m M.Ufuk TATLIDIL. I live in Istanbul / TURKEY. I graduated Istanbul University of Computer Engineering Department. I have been working for 15 years as a professional in the computing industry. Now, I’m working at a prominent Logistics company in Turkey, as a IT Manager. Also, I am offering consultancy services to various companies. My areas of interest and expertise are: Unified Communication (Exchange Server, Lync Server, Active Directory). My main area of expertise, Microsoft Exchange Systems.

    Turkish: Merhaba, ben Ufuk TATLIDIL. Istanbul /TÜRKİYE’ de yasıyorum. İstanbul Üniversitesi Bilgisayar Mühendisligi bölümünü okudum. Profesyonel olarak 15 yıldır IT sektörü içerisindeyim. Suanda sektöründe öncü bir Lojistik firmasında Bilgi İslem Müdürü olarak çalısmaktayım. Uzmanlık alanlarım; Unified Communication (Exchange Server, Lync Server, Active Directory) Asıl uzmanlıgım Microsoft Exchange sistemi’ dir.



    I have a lot of installation and migration projects I'm working on. Turkish banks computer systems of major infrastructure installations, Exchange Server Planning, Installation and Migration process've directed. Many corporate companies and configuration of the Exchange Server Cluster took part in the installation of infrastructure.

    Turkish: Birçok kurulum ve migration projesi gerçeklestirdim. Türkiyede ki bir çok Bankanın Bilgisayar altyapısını, bir çok kurumsal firmanın Exchange Server Migration ve Cluster yapı projelerinde görev aldım.




    Sertifikalarım
    • CEH: Certified Ethical Hacker
    • MCTS: Windows Server 2008 Active Directory: Configuration
    • MCTS: Windows Server 2008 Network Infrastructure
    • MCTS: Windows Server 2008 Applications Infrastructure
    • MCTS: Microsoft Windows Vista: Configuration
    • MCSA: Microsoft Solutions Associate
    • MCITP: Server Administrator
    • MCITP: Enterprise Administrator
    • MCITP: Enterprise Messaging Administrator
    • MCITP: Enterprise Support Technician
    • MCDST : Microsoft Certified Desktop Support Technician
    • MCSE+S+M : Microsoft Certified Systems Engineer / Security / Messaging
    • MCSA+S+M : Microsoft Certified Systems Administrator / Security / Messaging
